2023 Ford Escape

SUV · Model Year 2023

The 2023 Ford Escape is a suv from Ford. Use the VIN decoder below to look up full specifications, safety ratings, and open recalls for any 2023 Escape. Whether you're buying, selling, or maintaining a 2023 Escape, a VIN check reveals the complete vehicle history.

2023 Ford Escape Recalls

Safety recalls for the 2023 Ford Escape are issued by NHTSA when a safety-related defect is discovered. Common recall categories include airbag systems, engine components, electrical systems, and brake assemblies. All recall repairs are performed free of charge at authorized Ford dealerships regardless of mileage.

Enter your specific VIN above to check for open recalls on your 2023 Escape, or visit our Recall Checker tool.

2023 Ford Escape Ownership Resources

Insurance

Compare insurance rates for the 2023 Ford Escape from top carriers. Your 2023 model year, trim level, and safety features all affect your premium.

Warranty

Extended warranty plans can protect your 2023 Escape against costly repairs. Coverage typically includes powertrain and major electrical components.

Financing

Explore refinancing options for your 2023 Ford Escape. Refinancing could lower your monthly payment or reduce your interest rate.

Selling

Get instant offer quotes for your 2023 Ford Escape from multiple buyers. Online platforms often beat dealer trade-in values by 10–20%.
